title: Chat-app
description: A real-time messaging app supporting one-on-one and group chats with user authentication and chat history.

title: Notely
description: A note-taking app with features to create, update, delete, search, and view notes, along with real-time notifications and persistent storage.

title: BattleForge
description: A 2D fighting game built with HTML Canvas and JavaScript featuring two-player combat, animated characters, health bars, and a countdown timer.
